fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 30Y CAD
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR term = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]
VAR base = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
RETURN
IF(
    term = "30 Yr" || term = "30 Yr Swap" || term = "40 Yr" || term = "40 Yr Swap" || term = "50 Yr" || term = "50 Yr Swap" || term = "60 Yr" || term = "60 Yr Swap" || term = "70 Yr" || term = "70 Yr Swap",
    base,
    0
)
+ IF(term = "12 Yr" || term = "12 Yr Swap", 1/10 * base, 0)
+ IF(term = "15 Yr" || term = "15 Yr Swap", 1/4 * base, 0)
+ IF(term = "20 Yr" || term = "20 Yr Swap", 1/2 * base, 0)
+ IF(term = "25 Yr" || term = "25 Yr Swap", 3/4 * base, 0)
+ IF(term = "11 Yr" || term = "11 Yr Swap", 1/20 * base, 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the nested Tableau IF blocks into DAX using VARs for readability. Transformed each [TERM_LABEL] comparison and arithmetic into DAX, using 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Column] format for all field references. Each Tableau IF branch was converted to IF(condition, value, 0) and summed to match the original additive logic.
